headline.main: Alternate-Side Parking Rules Are Suspended on Wednesday and Thursday

docs.snippet: Alternate-side street-cleaning regulations will be suspended in New York City on Wednesday and Thursday. Other regulations will remain in effect....
docs.abstract: Alternate-side street-cleaning regulations will be suspended in New York City on Wednesday and Thursday. Other regulations will remain in effect.

docs.snippet: Federal agents raid 20 suspected "maternity hotels" that host foreign pregnant women looking to give birth on U.S. soil, with the promise of U.S. citizenship for their children. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal agents raid 20 suspected "maternity hotels" that host foreign pregnant women looking to give birth on U.S. soil, with the promise of U.S. citizenship for their children. Jillian Kitchener reports.

headline.main: Hudler Scores in OT to Give Flames 3-2 Win Over Flyers
headline.print_headline: Hudler Scores in OT to Give Flames 3-2 Win Over Flyers

docs.snippet: Jiri Hudler scored 1:23 into overtime to give the Calgary Flames a 3-2 win over the Philadelphia Flyers on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jiri Hudler scored 1:23 into overtime to give the Calgary Flames a 3-2 win over the Philadelphia Flyers on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Rudy Gay, Kings Hand Knicks Worst Loss of Season, 124-86
headline.print_headline: Rudy Gay, Kings Hand Knicks Worst Loss of Season, 124-86

docs.snippet: Rudy Gay scored 25 points, DeMarcus Cousins had 22 and Ben McLemore finished with 20 and the Sacramento Kings handed the New York Knicks their worst loss of the season Tuesday, 124-86....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rudy Gay scored 25 points, DeMarcus Cousins had 22 and Ben McLemore finished with 20 and the Sacramento Kings handed the New York Knicks their worst loss of the season Tuesday, 124-86.

headline.main: Vegas Hospital Sends Miscarried Babies to Laundry by Mistake
headline.print_headline: Vegas Hospital Sends Miscarried Babies to Laundry by Mistake

docs.snippet: Authorities say a Las Vegas hospital mistakenly sent two dead babies wrapped in linens to a laundry facility, leading to a grisly surprise for the cleaners....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities say a Las Vegas hospital mistakenly sent two dead babies wrapped in linens to a laundry facility, leading to a grisly surprise for the cleaners.

headline.main: Ovechkin's 2 Goals Lift Capitals Past Blue Jackets, 5-3
headline.print_headline: Ovechkin's 2 Goals Lift Capitals Past Blue Jackets, 5-3

docs.snippet: A great start, a clutch penalty kill at the end, and Alex Ovechkin in between spelled success for the Washington Capitals....
docs.lead_paragraph: A great start, a clutch penalty kill at the end, and Alex Ovechkin in between spelled success for the Washington Capitals.

headline.main: Schneider, Devils Hand Predators 4th Straight Loss
headline.print_headline: Schneider, Devils Hand Predators 4th Straight Loss

docs.snippet: The New Jersey Devils remain hopeful of making a charge to the playoffs. Thank Cory Schneider for that faith....
docs.lead_paragraph: The New Jersey Devils remain hopeful of making a charge to the playoffs. Thank Cory Schneider for that faith.

headline.main: Jefferson, Williams Lead Hornets Past Lakers 104-103
headline.print_headline: Jefferson, Williams Lead Hornets Past Lakers 104-103

docs.snippet: Al Jefferson had 21 points and 16 rebounds, Mo Williams added 20 points and 13 assists and the Charlotte Hornets beat the Los Angeles Lakers 104-103 on Tuesday night for their third win in four games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Al Jefferson had 21 points and 16 rebounds, Mo Williams added 20 points and 13 assists and the Charlotte Hornets beat the Los Angeles Lakers 104-103 on Tuesday night for their third win in four games.

headline.main: Jury Selection Continues in Colorado Theater Shooting Case
headline.print_headline: Jury Selection Continues in Colorado Theater Shooting Case

docs.snippet: Jury selection in the Colorado theater shooting trial is continuing with attorneys asking prospective jurors about their views on the death penalty and mental illness....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jury selection in the Colorado theater shooting trial is continuing with attorneys asking prospective jurors about their views on the death penalty and mental illness.
